ruqyah_sunnah.title: Ruqyah Dua - Angel Jibril's Healing
ruqyah_sunnah.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ أَرْقِيكَ، مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ يُؤْذِيكَ، مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ نَفْسٍ أَوْ عَيْنٍ حَاسِدٍ، اللَّهُ يَشْفِيكَ، بِسْمِ اللَّهِ أَرْقِيكَ
ruqyah_sunnah.english: In the Name of Allah, I perform ruqyah for you from everything that harms you, from the evil of every soul or envious eye. May Allah heal you. In the Name of Allah, I perform ruqyah for you.

ruqyah_sunnah.title: Ruqyah Dua - Seeking Refuge
ruqyah_sunnah.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ
ruqyah_sunnah.english: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from every devil and every poisonous pest, and from every evil, harmful, envious eye.

ruqyah_sunnah.title: Ruqyah Dua - Healing Prayer
ruqyah_sunnah.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ أَذْهِبِ الْبَأْسَ، اشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي، لَا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ، شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
ruqyah_sunnah.english: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the harm and heal. You are the Healer. There is no healing but Yours, a healing that leaves no disease behind.
